entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
